title: Character
description: A character in a role-playing game.

overview.description: An overview of the character's personality and background.

physicalDescription.description: A description of the character's physical appearance.

dallePrompt.description: A prompt to send to the DALLE API to generate an image of the character. The prompt should begin by asking for a watercolor and ink painting of the subject, then a sentence or two describing the character's appearance. Do not include the character's name in the prompt. The prompt should also include an appropriate background for the character.

personalGoals.description: What does this character want to achieve?

hook.description: A hook to help game masters introduce the character into the story, such as a small problem the character is currently facing.
